mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_place (user_id, place_id, category, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{place_id}, #{category}, now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM user_place WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND place_id = #{place_id}
SELECT * FROM user_place WHERE user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE user_place SET post_count = post_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE user_place SET post_count = post_count - 1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE user_place SET isshow = IF(#{isshow} = 1, isshow = 0, isshow = 1) WHERE id = #{id}
